basics.label: Flight Manager
basics.summary: I am an enthusiastic, fun and dedicated professional with exceptional communication, account management and conflict resolution skills. I have a passion for building relationships and providing exceptional customer service. Motivated by competition, Self-starter, and an effective team member.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Manage daily operations for 80 to 120 aircraft and strengthen relationships with assigned crew members to ensure a seamless travel experience for the client. Responsible for gathering and disseminating timely information to remedy disruptions caused by, but not limited to weather, human error and aircraft abnormalities. Provide a timely, professional and educated resource to crew members by thoroughly researching every concern and calmly resolving elevated issues. Train, mentor and act as a resource to new team members. Collaborated with leadership to create new communication tools for faster and more effective communication between departments.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for greeting customers and providing an enjoyable shopping experience through excellent customer service, product knowledge and communication. Hired as a permanent employee after being hired to seasonal help resulting from high productivity. Independently designed store visuals using guidance from corporate standards.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for proving customer service, database instruction and fielding phone calls. Spearheaded the creation of an interactive advertisement/exhibit for a school play showcasing students writing and acting talents.
